alert.note: Alert for Rutherford (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 8:21PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rutherford County through 845 PM CDT... At 821 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over western Murfreesboro, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro and Christiana. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 between mile markers 74 and 88. Interstate 840 between mile markers 51 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
